body_html: If someone is interested in adding CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER='PCI_BUS_ID' support in TensorFlow, a contribution is welcome. But note that we can only override it if it is not already set. And it has to been before any potential Cuda calls are made.
body_text: If someone is interested in adding CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER='PCI_BUS_ID' support in TensorFlow, a contribution is welcome. But note that we can only override it if it is not already set. And it has to been before any potential Cuda calls are made.
body: If someone is interested in adding CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER='PCI_BUS_ID' support in TensorFlow, a contribution is welcome. But note that we can only override it if it is not already set. And it has to been before any potential Cuda calls are made.
